transcript: You know what we got right now? A six pack. I can't believe her if you got a six pack. A six pack would be just the ticket right about now.

segments.text: You know what we got right now? A six pack.
I can't believe her if you got a six pack. A six pack would be just the ticket right about now.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: You know what would be good right now? A six-pack. Ah, I can't believe I forgot a six-pack. A six-pack would be just the ticket right about now.
